page.title: 06SHOPPING IN PRICETOWN
page.content: THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA IN PRICETOWN IS OGWY STREET.THERE ARE 14 SMALL SHOPS THEY INCLUDE A NEWSAGENT,THREE SMALL CLOTHES SHOPS,A CAFE,A PET SHOP,A BUTCHERS,2 GROCERS, A POST OFFICE,CHEMISTS,BAKERS,SHOE SHOP AND A D.I.Y. SHOP.THE BUSIEST TIME FOR THE SHOPS IS FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.WE TOOK A SHOPPING CENSUS THIS MORNING,FRIDAY JUNE 28,FOR 1/2 HOUR.A TOTAL OF 48 PEOPLE VISITED THE VARIOUS SHOPS IN THAT TIME.THE BAKERS,GROCERS AND THE NEWSAGENTS WERE THE BUSIEST.THE DAILY MIRROR IS THE MOST POPULAR NEWSPAPER DELIVERED TO PEOPLES HOMES,WHILE UNCUT WHITE BREAD,IS THE MOST POPULAR LOAF BOUGHT AT THE BAKERS.THE SMALL PET SHOP WAS ALSO BUSY,DOGS AND PIGEONS ARE THE MOST POPULAR PETS IN THE AREA.THE SHOPPERS LIKE THE FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE IN THE SHOPS AND THE OPPORTUNITY TO MEET FRIENDS.
